articles.description: Platypus 2.2M Exploit Platypus on Avalanche experienced a flash loan hack and lost 2.2 million. The team is investigating and the liquidity pools have been temporarily halted. IPOR V2 Live Lending IPOR launches V2. New upgrades include Custom APRs with zaps, $stETH pool, 90d swaps, a new architecture, and updated UX/UI.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Platypus $2.2M Exploit, IPOR V2 Live, On-Chain Limit Orders, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Frax sFRAX Live Frax Finance launches sFRAX. Users are able to stake their FRAX and earn Tbill yield on it, similar to $DAI's DSR. Yield is at ~10%. Tangible USDR Depegs Tangibleâ€™s liquid $DAI from the $USDR treasury was redeemed and caused an accelerated drawdown in the market cap, leading to the USDR de-pegging.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Frax sFRAX Live, Tangible USDR Depegs, Mars V2 Live, Farming Airdrop on New EVM Chain, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Perennial V2 on Arbitrum Arbitrum-based derivatives AMM Perennial launches V2 with a faster oracle, cheaper fees, deeper liquidity, and improved risk management. VNX on Avalanche RWA protocol VNX launches VEUR and VCHF on Avalanche, allowing users to access European fiat currencies on-chain.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Perennial V2 Live,FX Trading on Avalanche, Stable Yields, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: MEV Protocol Live Manifold launches MEV Protocol on Ethereum. The protocol's MEV auction system permits multiple winners per auction slot. MEV protocol will integrate mevETH, an LST launched by Manifold. Armada Live on Solana Token liquidity management protocol Armada is live on Solana.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - MEV Protocol Live, Token Liquidity Management on Solana, Quest to Earn, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Native BTC Coming to Cosmos nBTC, an IBC-compatible token issued by the Nomic chain, will launch on Osmosis. nBTC will allow users to bring their BTC into Cosmos without converting it into another cryptocurrency. TProtocol USTP RWA project TProtocol launches USTP, a stablecoin backed by US treasury yield. USTP has three types that meet the different needs of investors: rUSTP, iUSTP, and Standard USTP.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Native BTC Coming to Cosmos, Stablecoin Backed by Treasuries, Automated Uni V3 LPing, and more...

articles.description: Grayscale Filed for Spot ETH ETF Grayscale and NYSE Arca have filed Form 19b-4 with the SEC to convert Grayscale Ethereum Trust $ETHE to a spot Ethereum ETF. Bitcoin Spot ETFs incoming? According to ETF analyst Eric Balchunas, â€œSEC delayed spot bitcoin filings last week they also sent the issuers comments to address re their S-1 filingsâ€, which could be a positive sign for approvals.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Grayscale Files ETH Spot ETF, Bitcoin Spot ETFs Incoming?, Leverage BTC On chain, and more...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - ETH Futures Potential Launch, Yearn veYFI Soon, LPing with Options, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: HTX $8M Hack HTX was hacked and lost 5,000 ETH (~$8M). The loss has been covered and issues have been resolved according to HTX advisor Justin Sun. Dopex CLAMM Public Testing Deopx launches public testing for CLAMM. CLAMM is part of the Dopex V2 upgrade, using v3 AMM positions to help LPs earn additional premiums and give option buyers more flexibility.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - HTX 8M Hack, Dopex CLAMM Pubic Testing, Double Rewards LPing, and more...

articles.description: Linear â„“USD Exploit Linear Finance was exploited and the attackers drained all â„“USD liquidity on both PancakeSwap and Ascendex, resulting in the price of â„“USD going to zero. Linear contracts are paused and the team works with security firms to track the attackers.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Linear â„“USD Exploit , Intents Based Dex, Perp trading without liquidation!?, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: GammaSwap Live GammaSwap is live on Arbitrum mainnet. Gamma is a DEX on top of Uniswap v2, allowing users to trade volatility through AMMs (i.e. short LP tokens). Traders can use Gamma to speculate on volatility or as "insurance" for their spot holdings, and MMs can use Gamma to hedge their LP position.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - GammaSwap Live, Poolshark Limit Pools, Higher Savings Rate, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Balancer Frontend Attack Balancer frontend is under a DNS attack. Users are advised to not interact with the UI while the issue is under investigation. Approved: Gro to Unwind The Gro community voted to wind down the protocol and DAO due to the leadership vacuum and existential uncertainty.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Balancer Frontend Attack, RWA Partnership: Centrifuge x Aave, Diversified LST Yield, and More...

articles.description: DeFi Saver Savings Protection DeFi Saver launches savings protection automation (Supply and Payback) for Liquity and Maker users. Approved: 50M ARB Short-term Incentive Program Arbitrum governance voted to distribute up to 50M ARB of DAO-funded incentives targeting active Arbitrum protocols.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - DeFi Saver Savings Protection, ARB Short-term Incentive Program, LST Farming, and More...
